name: My Billionaire: Love Stories
description:
Indulge your fantasy and live your best love life in My Billionaire: Love Stories! 

Do you desire luxury? Do you dream of great love or episodes of fiery passion?

Whatever your choice is, our exciting chapters will capture your interest and grab your attention!

And remember – your decision means everything!

Always wanted a makeover? Your avatar is completely customizable!

Dress like the upper class – there are many glamorous outfits to choose from!

Choose your fate by making choices that have an impact on the storyline!

Read all kinds of thrilling stories - romance, drama, passion - all filled with opulence and wealth.

In MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, your hot rich boss finds himself in some drama, and he needs your help to keep his empire. He suggests you role play his wife! This means you will be dating your boss and he is a heartbreaker... Is it a love story or are you just going to get lovesick? Are you going to develop feelings for each other?

In BAD BEST MAN, your love life seems perfect until an old flame enters the picture – and he just happens to be your fiancé’s best man! He’s handsome, rich, and determined to win you over. Who are you going to choose? Will you take a chance and get seduced by this charming billionaire?

Do you like it when he knows what he wants? You’ve found your new obsession...online! He is everything you ever wanted – confident and sensual. But it turns out to be a forbidden affair when you find out he is your new boss! Can you keep this a secret? Play a game of seduction in TIED UP BY CEO! You are consenting adults after all.

Read the chapters of BILLIONAIRE’S DARLING! You are a simple girl, and he is a young and hot billionaire. Dating someone that rich is a completely novel concept to you! You both agree not to fall in love. He keeps a cold exterior, but there are moments when he showers you with affection. Could it be that he is lovestruck? There are many secrets and hidden desires waiting to be revealed in this story.

Play our chapters now to find out how your story ends!
